item.title: Flappy Feta - Eat and Save Greece! on the App Store
item.description:
Flappy Feta - Eat and Save Greece! on the App Store

We are unable to find iTunes on your computer. To download the free app Flappy Feta - Eat and Save Greece! by Alexander Patouchas, get iTunes now. Already have iTunes? Click I Have iTunes to open it now. iTunes for Mac + PC By Alexander Patouchas Open iTunes to buy and download apps.

item.title: Pilars to divinity
item.description:
Pilars to divinity

In the ancient town of Olympia you can sense the heroic times of the past.

item.title: The old town
item.description:
The old town

Monemvasia is my second home. The beautiful costal town in Southern Greece is home to much of the beauty the Peloponnesian peninsula elegantly has to offer.

item.title: Alex on America | Startup Life
item.description:
Alex on America | Startup Life

This is a post written by Alex, our beloved in-house philosopher, working at Supercell SF office. Here he shares some of his thoughts on american society and culture. This is America! A phrase that conveys a message of the Greatness of this nation.

item.title: Why the hell would you want to work at a startup? - Reflections of a homegrown pseudophilosopher | Startup Life
item.description:
Why the hell would you want to work at a startup? - Reflections of a homegrown pseudophilosopher | Startup Life

My name is Alexander, "Allu" or Alex as they tend to call me in the Land of the Free. I have the privilege of working in Marketing Analytics at a great games company, Supercell, in the beautiful city of San Francisco on a H1­B visa.

item.title: Alexander Patouchas's albums | Flickr - Photo Sharing!
Welcome
item.description:
Welcome

El Greco on matka itäisen Välimeren saariston helmaan - kreikkalaisen ruokakulttuurin ihmeelliseen maailmaan. Vaikkei sisustuksemme olekaan se perus sinivalkoinen, saat meiltä Stadin kenties viettelevintä tzatzikia ja herkullisinta karitsaa. Pääruoissa perinteet näkyvät niin herkullisena Stifado-patana kuin mureina lammasruokina. Oli kyse sitten karitsan kyljyksistä tai lampaan ulkofileestä, valmistamme ne aina huolella ja raaka-aineita kunnioittaen.

item.title: Aristotelian Observations
item.description:
Aristotelian Observations

Je suis Charlie. Je suis Paris. Oui. Mais pourquoi nous ne somme pas Nairobi, Beyrouth (yeah, that's the French spelling) ou Borno? Telle est la question. Now that I've amazed you with my skills extraordinaire in Google Translate French, let me share with you some thoughts and ranting distilled from the bearded Greek philosopher part of my mind.

item.title: Who is This Guy?
item.description:
Who is This Guy?

I'm half Finnish half Greek hence only 50% bankrupt. Excited about a bunch of things as long as it's intellectually pleasing. Whatever that means. I was born in Finland. Spent all the childhood summers in Greece. Lived for a semester in the city of London - no not in the UK but in Ontario, Canada.
